REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0624 reute d f BC-ARUS-<ARSCC>-GETS-5.2 04-09 0070

TEXT.TITLE: ARUS <ARSCC> GETS 5.2 MLN DLR ORDER
TEXT.BODY: Arus Corp said it has received a letter of intent from Winston Financial Corp for the purchase of over 5,200,000 dlrs in telephone diagnostic testing equipment. It said it expects to negotiate a firm order in May. The company said the total value of the order is at least 5,200,000 dlrs and could be more, depending on circuit configurations required. Reuter
